title: IT Modernization Consultant for Digital Banking
company_type: 201-500 employees · IT Services and IT Consulting
company_description:
SIGMATECH is the enterprise technology partner of choice for software development, delivering a broad range of web, mobile, and desktop controls coupled with a service-oriented approach throughout the entire application life cycle.


SIGMATECH consists of highly skilled developers specializing in agile development methodology, focusing on Mobile & Web Solution, IT Services and business enterprise, utilizing modern programming languages as our platform. SigmaTech has established itself as the trusted partner for use in mission-critical applications and service clientele from global insurance company, government agencies and large consumer product manufacturer.
about_the_job:
IT Modernization is the process of updating an organization's information technology infrastructure, practices and systems to keep up with emerging technologies. A major revamp of an organization's IT backbone, IT modernization helps businesses stay competitive in today's constantly shifting digital landscape.

By embracing modern IT tools and technologies, such as artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud-based infrastructures, businesses undergo a digital transformation, enhancing efficiency, reducing expenses and strengthening their security posture.

IT modernization affects many different components of the digital ecosystem, which includes everything from network resources to end-user hardware and storage systems.

It can involve embracing cloud computing and a cloud-first mindset. For example, migrating on-premises servers to a cloud-based model -- where a third party hosts a significant portion of the hardware and software -- enables businesses to consume resources on an as-needed basis.

While The Specific Areas Of Focus Can Vary, Depending On The Needs Of An Organization, The Following Are The Common Areas Of Improvement And Key Initiatives Of IT Modernization

Upgrading infrastructure and hardware.
Improving applications and software.
Updating data management techniques.
Using cloud-based services.
Enhancing cybersecurity measures.
Putting automation and AI into practice.
Using collaborative tools.
Enhancing customer satisfaction.
Using edge computing and the internet of things.
Using Agile and DevOps approaches.
Integrating cloud-based options with DevOps, application programming interfaces and microservices.

Mandatory

Degree Level : Bachelor's degree for most positions; some employers prefer a master's degree
Degree Field : Computer science or related field
Key Skills : Excellent interpersonal, communication, and leadership skills; ability to work with a team; creative thinking skills; strong analytical skills; adaptability
Willing to full WFO - Digital Banking Industry
Location : Rajawali Place - HR. Rasuna Said, Kuningan, Setiabudi, South Jakarta

title: Solution Architect
company_description:
Energy Jobline is the largest and fastest growing global Energy Job Board and Energy Hub. We have an audience reach of over 4 million energy professionals, 400,000+ monthly advertised global energy and engineering jobs, and work with the leading energy companies worldwide.

We focus on the Oil & Gas, Renewables, Engineering, Power, and Nuclear markets as well as emerging technologies in EV, Battery, and Fusion. We are committed to providing the most talented energy professionals for our client recruitment campaigns and ensuring we offer the most exciting career opportunities for our jobseekers. Energy Jobline has quickly risen to become the leading and pioneering Energy platform providing online recruitment solutions to the energy industry globally.

Our core values are innovation, inclusivity, commitment, results and diversity. We strive towards these goals across all aspects of our business and that’s why we never stop perfecting our route to market. We appreciate that the energy industry greatest resource is people, that’s why we work with the leading clients and best candidates worldwide.

Our commitment to Women In Energy, BAME and Diversity Groups, as well as unique and passive audiences, aids in setting us apart from our key competitors. No other online recruitment platform has aligned itself with the same breadth and depth of quality partners including female engineering bodies, online energy news hubs, community platforms, industry associations and more. The strength of these partnerships allows us to deliver a database which is exclusive, exceptional and individual to Energy Jobline.

The team at Energy Jobline focus entirely on delivering value for our clients and candidates, quality is central to everything we do. We have a huge level of loyalty and engagement from our candidates- in which over a third of our candidates only use Energy Jobline for their job search. A figure we are very proud of and work hard to maintain.
…

about_the_job:
Solution Architect has to understand company solutions and customer requirements including customer pains to be able to design or adapt the existing including 3rd parties’ solutions to fulfill customer requirements.

He or She must work closely with customers, sales and product/solution specialists to ensure that the proposed solution will be delivered effectively.

Goal For This Role

 Ability to find the best technical solution to solve pain-points from existing problems.
 Describing the characteristics, behavior, structure and other aspects of the platform developed to project stakeholders.
 Providing specifications according to which the solution is defined, managed, and delivered.
 Defining and determining features, solution requirements and phases in the required project.

Responsibilities

 Analyzing customer requirements and specifications.
 Creating solutions.
 Participating in Technology selection from local partners.
 Project Management Support.
 Assist in sales and marketing events
 Coverage includes all ASEAN countries with Indonesia focus

Experience

 At least 3 years in Software Development/Automation/Control Engineering, familiar with Big Data, AI and ML is a plus.
 Speak fluent both Indonesian and English (Or Chinese and English).
 Familiar with Data visualization software such as Power BI and Tableau.
 Familiar with Azure/AWS Cloud Services
 Experienced with IoT protocols e.g. MQTT , JSON format.
 Experienced with factory automation and process automation system.
 Worked with IoT platform(s) and MQTT broker(s) including API interfaces.
 Worked with databases e.g. MSSLQ, MySQL, PostgreSQL or others.
 Had some experienced in Industrial Network and IoT network e.g. Ethernet, WiFi , LoRA or LoRaWAN, NB-IoT.
 open for Indonesian Passport holder only.
Placement: Indonesia, Jakarta.

Softskills

 Good at technical presentation.
 Love and happy to adapt yourself to any new technologies.
 Excellent communication skills to work with colleague from diverse backgrounds & cultures
 Able to work in collaborative environment and startup mode
 Analytical Mindset

With over 90 years' combined experience, NES Fircroft (NES) is proud to be the world's leading engineering staffing provider spanning the Oil & Gas, Power & Renewables, Chemicals, Construction & Infrastructure, Life Sciences, Mining and Manufacturing sectors worldwide. With more than 80 offices in 45 countries, we are able to provide our clients with the engineering and technical expertise they need, wherever and whenever it is needed. We offer contractors far more than a traditional recruitment service, supporting with everything from securing visas and work permits, to providing market-leading benefits packages and accommodation, ensuring they are safely and compliantly able to support our clients.

title: Chief Technology Officer
company_description:
Over the last 38 years, Robert Walters has grown and so have our ambitions. We now employ over 4,200 talented staff across 31 countries. Businesses world-wide rely on us to find the very best specialist professionals to drive their business forward. Why? Because those same professionals trust us to manage their long-term careers.

We're proud to be a world-leading recruitment consultancy with one million followers on LinkedIn. We also have a successful recruitment outsourcing business called Resource Solutions and a clerical recruitment brand operating in Europe called Walters People.

Our philosophy:


We don't aim to be the biggest recruitment consultancy but we do aim to be the best. We help businesses build powerful teams that deliver against exceptionally high standards by holding ourselves up to those same values. Quality and integrity are our watchwords and we like to think we're different. Here's a flavour of why:

• We have specialist recruitment teams who are experts in their area. Whether they're recruiting in accountancy, HR or legal, you won't find them working outside their area of expertise
• Our consultants don't work on commission, but instead rely on team work to ensure the right person is placed in the right job
• We will never send out your CV without express permission. Quite simply, we don't think it's right

We're proud of what we've achieved so far. But we don't look back, we're always innovating:

• We were the first recruitment consultancy to launch a recruitment outsourcing business
• The first to launch a Global Salary Survey
• We were the first to launch a salary checker app for iPhone and launched a Manga interview app
…
show more
about_the_job:
A Chief Technology Officer job has become available at a market-leading logistic technology company in Jakarta, Indonesia.

About The Chief Of Technology Officer Role

As the Chief of Technology Officer you will take the lead the technological strategy and innovation for the whole organisation. In addition to that you will also play a pivotal role in shaping the digital future, ensuring seamless operations, and driving technological excellence to support the high volume of transactions of the company.

Key Responsibilities

Develop and implement a robust technology strategy aligned with the company's overall business goals
Identify and evaluate emerging technologies and trends to drive innovation and maintain a competitive edge
Oversee the design and implementation of scalable, reliable, and secure systems to handle large transaction volumes
Lead efforts to integrate various technology platforms for efficient and streamlined logistics operations
Implement and maintain robust cybersecurity measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with industry regulations

To succeed in this Chief Technology Officer job, you will need to have experience working in a large and vast technology environment with high volume transactions.

Key Requirements

Proven experience as a Chief Technology Officer or in a senior technology leadership role within the logistics industry
In-depth knowledge of logistics and supply chain technologies
Strong expertise in system architecture, transaction processing, and data management
Experience with emerging technologies such as IoT, block chain, and AI in the logistics industry context
Excellent leadership and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across departments

If you are a visionary Senior Technology professional who is passionate about technology, this Chief Technology Officer role is the right role for you.

Great career progression opportunities await the right person in this Chief Technology Officer role.

Apply today or contact me to discuss this new opportunity.

 

Due to the high volume of applications we are experiencing, our team will only be in touch with you if your application is shortlisted.

about_the_job:
Company Description
PT Dimata Sora Jayate is a technology company located in Denpasar, Indonesia. We provide different software products for small to medium industries, supply chains, retail, and wholesalers. Additionally, we offer comprehensive solutions, including an integrated hotel management system, human resource management system, cross-organization system, and smart banking solutions. We use different technologies, such as object-oriented development, web-based, mobile, web services, and microservices architecture. Our team uses Java Enterprise, QDEP, Java Spring Boot, Quarkus, Java Vaadin, Java Android, Kotlin Multiplatform, Google Flutter, Tomcat, MySQL, Oracle, GitLab/Github, and other frameworks, tools, and target systems for software development.

Role Description
We are looking for a full-time software development team member specializing in System Analyst, Web & Mobile Programmer, and IoT with experience in software development, systems analysis, analytical skills, and troubleshooting. This is an on-site role located in Denpasar, Indonesia, and you will be working with our development team daily. You will work on IoT projects as a software developer and system analyst, build web and mobile applications with colleagues to support our clients.

Qualifications
Experience in systems analysis, software development , and system testing
Strong analytical skills
Ability to troubleshoot software issues
Experience with creating software documentation

Relevant skills and qualifications that would be beneficial:

Experience with IoT software development
Experience working with Web Services and Microservices Architecture
Development/ programming experience with Java Enterprise, QDEP, Java Spring Boot, Quarkus, Java Vaadin, Java Android, KOotlin, Google Flutter, Tomcat, MySQL, Oracle, and Github
Comfortable working with different operating systems (Windows, Linux, Android, iOS)
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field

title: Intern UI/UX Game
company_type: See how you compare to 63 applicants. Try Premium for IDR0
about_the_job:
Company Description: WIR Group merupakan salah satu pemain terkemuka dalam teknologi imersif Augmented Reality (AR) yang terintegrasi dengan Virtual Reality (VR), dan Artificial intelligence (AI) di Asia Tenggara. Dalam melaksanakan kegiatan usahanya, WIR Group memiliki visi untuk menyediakan solusi ‘smart society’ dan dunia O2O (Online to Offline) Metaverse yang dapat dinikmati semua orang (A liveable world of O2O (Online to Offline) metaverse for everyone) dalam memasuki era web 3.0. WIR Group saat ini memiliki 5 (lima) paten global untuk AR yang terdaftar secara nasional maupun pada Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) yang mencakup 150+ negara. WIR Group telah menyelesaikan lebih dari seribu proyek, yang meliputi proyek pengembangan aplikasi AR dan VR dan proyek branding, untuk korporasi dari beragam sektor industri yang berada di lebih dari 20 negara. Kegiatan usaha utama WIR Group melalui Anak Usaha yaitu menyediakan jasa teknologi berbasis AR dengan menggabungkan teknologi VR, AI, Internet of Things (IoT) dan teknologi pendukung lainnya seperti Blockchain dan mechatronics sebagai sarana untuk menghasilkan ide dan produk yang memungkinkan interaksi antara dunia virtual dan dunia nyata yang disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan masing-masing konsumen. WIR Group masuk ke dalam daftar “Metaverse Technology Companies to Watch in 2022” versi Forbes bersama-sama dengan Apple, Microsoft, Facebook, Magic Leap, Niantic, dan Snap Inc. WIR Group menjadi salah satu pembicara yang mewakili Indonesia di acara ASEAN-ROK (Republic of Korea) Innovation Summit 2021 dan membicarakan dimulainya era Metaverse. Selain itu WIR Group juga dipercaya oleh pemerintah Pemerintah RI (Kementerian Investasi/BKPM) untuk mewakili Indonesia pada kegiatan World Economic Forum (WEF) Davos pada tahun 2019, 2020 dan 2022. Job Description:

 Intern UI/UX Game

about_the_job:
Position : Senior Control System Engineer

Employment : Contract to Permanent

Location : Jakarta

Travel Requirement : Yes, National and International Project Locations

Eligibility : Indonesian Passport and/or KTP Holder

Responsibilities

A senior Control System Engineer or Automation Engineer is responsible for the Control System design, project organization, and project execution of company engineering projects in compliance with International, National, and Company standards and procedures for Best Practice Design, Environment, Health, and Safety.

Continuous learning and growing

Requirement 

Bachelor’s Degree (S1) – Software Engineer, Control Engineering, Electrical Science, Physic Engineering or other technical background with on hands experience in the daily work.
Automation Engineering/Programming Experience – 5+ years (including DCS and PLC).
IoT Experience - connectivity, software development, data communication & data analysis.
Able to drive a team and as part of team, and can bring something special to the team.
good experience for engineering software in Process Automation
Studio500, FTLink, FTView SE, FTView ME
UnityProCL, Citect SCADA, Wonderware
PCS 7, PDM, WicCC, STEP7, SITRANS
PAC System, DELTA VTM
Communication Protocol; EtherNet/IP, Profibus, Profinet, Modbus, HART
Have good experience in designing the system architecture, wiring diagram, process and instrument diagrams
Have good experience in Digitalization and IIoT industrial applications
Have Experience in Electrical Drive & Control

company_description:
Siemens is a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.
In fiscal 2022, which ended on September 30, 2022, the Siemens Group generated revenue of €72.0 billion and net income of €4.4 billion. As of September 30, 2022, the company had around 311,000 employees worldwide. Further information is available at www.siemens.com.

title: Drives Service Engineer
location: Jakarta, Jakarta, Indonesia Reposted 41 minutes ago
company_description:
Siemens is a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.
In fiscal 2022, which ended on September 30, 2022, the Siemens Group generated revenue of €72.0 billion and net income of €4.4 billion. As of September 30, 2022, the company had around 311,000 employees worldwide. Further information is available at www.siemens.com.
about_the_job:
We know that a business only thrives if our people are thriving. That’s why we always put our people first. Our global and diverse team would be happy to support you and challenge you to grow in many ways. Who knows where our joint journey will take you?

You’ll make an impact by: 

Handling start-up, commissioning and troubleshooting of LV Drives, Motors and Electrical connection.
Capability to provide analysis reports and solutions to customers and internal.
Developing & maintaining good communications and relationships with customers and internal.
Assist in the development of incoming opportunity
Support daily activities in Oncall Service, Project Execution and Technical Consultancy

Your defining qualities:

Having at least 3 years of intensive experience in drive and motor application (engineering, commissioning and troubleshooting).
On hand experience in drive coordination application.
Having experience in industries such as crane, metal, mining processing, spinning machine, automotive and machining.
University degree in Electrical / Mechatronic / Control System or other relevant disciplines.
Knowledge in PLC & Electrical drawing is preferred.
Knowledge in digitalization on drive applications and IoT is an advantage.

Create a better #TomorrowWithUs!

We value your unique identity and perspective and are fully committed to providing equitable opportunities and building a workplace that reflects the diversity of society. Come bring your authentic self and create a better tomorrow with us.

title: Videographer
company_type: See how you compare to 125 applicants. Try Premium for IDR0
about_the_job:
Company Description: WIR Group merupakan salah satu pemain terkemuka dalam teknologi imersif Augmented Reality (AR) yang terintegrasi dengan Virtual Reality (VR), dan Artificial intelligence (AI) di Asia Tenggara. Dalam melaksanakan kegiatan usahanya, WIR Group memiliki visi untuk menyediakan solusi ‘smart society’ dan dunia O2O (Online to Offline) Metaverse yang dapat dinikmati semua orang (A liveable world of O2O (Online to Offline) metaverse for everyone) dalam memasuki era web 3.0. WIR Group saat ini memiliki 5 (lima) paten global untuk AR yang terdaftar secara nasional maupun pada Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) yang mencakup 150+ negara. WIR Group telah menyelesaikan lebih dari seribu proyek, yang meliputi proyek pengembangan aplikasi AR dan VR dan proyek branding, untuk korporasi dari beragam sektor industri yang berada di lebih dari 20 negara. Kegiatan usaha utama WIR Group melalui Anak Usaha yaitu menyediakan jasa teknologi berbasis AR dengan menggabungkan teknologi VR, AI, Internet of Things (IoT) dan teknologi pendukung lainnya seperti Blockchain dan mechatronics sebagai sarana untuk menghasilkan ide dan produk yang memungkinkan interaksi antara dunia virtual dan dunia nyata yang disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan masing-masing konsumen. WIR Group masuk ke dalam daftar “Metaverse Technology Companies to Watch in 2022” versi Forbes bersama-sama dengan Apple, Microsoft, Facebook, Magic Leap, Niantic, dan Snap Inc. WIR Group menjadi salah satu pembicara yang mewakili Indonesia di acara ASEAN-ROK (Republic of Korea) Innovation Summit 2021 dan membicarakan dimulainya era Metaverse. Selain itu WIR Group juga dipercaya oleh pemerintah Pemerintah RI (Kementerian Investasi/BKPM) untuk mewakili Indonesia pada kegiatan World Economic Forum (WEF) Davos pada tahun 2019, 2020 dan 2022. Job Description:

 Videographer

title: Senior Strategic Partnership Associate for System Integrator/Reseller
company_type: See how you compare to 14 applicants. Try Premium for IDR0
about_the_job:
Company Description

McEasy is Indonesia's Top Transportation Management System with IoT Integration.

Hundreds of companies use our products to assist their operations and logistics, including Alfamidi, FedEx, Club, Cleo, Anteraja, MGM Bosco, Mulia Ceramics, Polda Jatim, Go Trans, AKAS, and etc.

Currently we are looking for best candidate to become Field Sales Specialist to join our winning team. This position will work closely with our Head of Sales, Head of Partnership, Branding Manager, and Marketing Manager to meet the targeted number of sales.

Job Description

Research and identify potential partners in target markets
Execute recruitment strategies to onboard new Partners aligned with company goals
Provide comprehensive product and sales training to partners. 
Work closely with partners to manage Business pipelines and forecast accurately
Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) for partners
Foster strong relationships through regular communication and collaboration
Regularly assess partner performance and implement improvement strategies as needed

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field
Minimum 2 years of experience in partnership, business development, or a related field. 
Proven track record of successfully managing partnerships with System Integrators and Resellers
Proven experience in partnership management with a focus on reseller relationships. 
Strong training and presentation skills to provide comprehensive product and sales training to partners
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills to foster strong relationships through regular communication and collaboration

title: Business Analyst (IIOT & Digital Tranformation)
company_description:
At Hyppies, we're more than just a recruitment company; we're a movement. Inspired by the ethos of hypergrowth and high potential, we're dedicated to matching the most talented individuals with the most ambitious tech companies.
Our name, Hyppies, is a nod to the revolutionary spirit of the hippie movement, reflecting our commitment to challenging the conventional approach to tech recruitment.

Our Vision
We envision a world where the right talent meets the right opportunity, creating a synergy that fuels innovation and growth in the tech sector. We believe in the power of people and their potential to transform industries, and we're here to make those connections happen.

Our Services
Recruitment : We specialize in identifying high-potential talent for roles that demand innovation and expertise. Our extensive network across the tech industry enables us to find the perfect match for both companies and candidates.

Contracting: Recognizing the need for flexibility in the fast-paced tech world, we offer staffing solutions for short-term and project-based needs.

Large-Scale Recruitment Projects: Hyppies offers streamlined, high-quality recruitment solutions for companies facing rapid expansion and large-scale hiring needs.

Offshoring: We specialize in establishing efficient offshore teams, connecting you with a global talent pool to enhance diversity and optimize costs.

Market Insights: With our finger on the pulse of Asia's tech scene, we offer valuable insights into market trends, helping companies and professionals stay ahead of the curve.

Our Presence
Headquartered in Singapore, Hyppies operates across Asia with additional offices in Malaysia and Indonesia. This strategic presence allows us to tap into diverse talent pools and offer region-specific market expertise.

Our Culture
We're proud to embody the spirit of non-conformity and freedom that marked the hippie movement. At Hyppies, creativity and out-of-the-box thinking are at the core of what we do.
about_the_job:
Our client is a leading player of Industrial Internet of Things (IIOT). They are prominent by their comprehensive platform and innovation, with a mission to accelerate the industrial digital transformation and strive for net-zero carbon emissions.

What you will do.

Leadership and Execution. Drive the project team to achieve successful research, development, implementation, launch, and acceptance.
Requirements Definition and Management. Analyze and translate customer business needs into actionable requirements. Control scope creep and ensure core documentation is comprehensive.
Project Control and Oversight. Oversee the implementation process, meticulously managing scope, schedule, quality, risks, cost, and changes.
Resource Management and Collaboration. Lead and mobilize diverse resources, effectively guiding implementation and development consultants to achieve goals.
Operational Management and Communication. Manage on-site personnel during project operation and maintain open communication with customer senior management.

What you bring.

 Degree in computer science, software engineering, business management, or related fields 
 Min. 5 years of experience in project management, demand analysis, or technology development 
 Experience in forestry/planting, large-scale IoT, smart manufacturing, or enterprise digital transformation projects 
 Strong communication and coordination skills in English, with excellent planning, logical thinking, and data analysis skills 
 Strong team leadership and delegation skills 
 Willing to travel for business (domestic and international) 

How to apply.

Send your resume here or to sandra.soenaryo@hyppies.com

Di masa depan, kita akan mulai fokus mengembangkan gabungan industri aksesoris pintar
dan produk IoT untuk mencakup semua aspek kehidupan. Melalui peningkatan kualitas
produk dan kepuasan pengguna, kami juga akan memperluas cakupan pasar.
about_the_job:
Company Description: Olike adalah Brand berbasis gaya hidup dan teknologi yang bergerak dalam bisnis aksesori ponsel cerdas berkualitas tinggi, produk IoT mutakhir, mainan edutech, dan peralatan rumah tangga. Kami adalah bagian dari Sands Group of Companies di Indonesia yang meliputi OPPO, YOU, Makuku, Tomoro Coffee, JetCommerce & J&T. Merek ini muncul pada tahun 2021 melalui penggabungan dua merek mapan di Indonesia – OASE, pemain kunci di pasar Aksesoris & IoT dan Olike Edutoys, merek terkemuka perangkat pembelajaran dan peralatan rumah tangga anak. Sebagai entitas gabungan, perusahaan PT. OASE TEKNOLOGI ASIA mempertahankan nama merek Olike. Job Description:

 Memberikan Penawaran dan Informasi semua Item Produk kepada calon Pelanggan (Customer).
 Menjalin hubungan yang baik dan membangun koneksi dengan Konsumen dan Calon Konsumen.
 Mampu bekerja dalam Team maupun Individual.
 Mencari dan melakukan pendekatan terhadap customer potensial.
